pages.title: Cotton bush
pages.text: Cotton bush is a high plant, native to warm and hot plains-like biomes.Cotton bush gives cotton fiber when right-clicked, and drop cotton seeds when destroyed.Cotton can be cultivated as a crop, using these seeds.

pages.title: Cotton fiber
pages.text: Cotton fiber is a raw material, that can be used to make cotton yarn if spinned by a spinning wheel.

pages.title: Cotton yarn
pages.text: Cotton yarn is a result of spinning cotton fiber.It can be used to craft cotton cloth (with the help of the loom) and strings.

pages.title: Cotton cloth
pages.text: Cotton cloth is a result of weaving cotton yarns.It is used in crafting recipes.
